Episode.GuestStars: |Andy Dick|Don LaFontaine|Fred Willard|Gene Simmons|Jane Lynch|Jon Favreau|Lauren Graham|Michael McKean|Michelle Horn|Paul Stanley|Sean Flynn|Sean Flynn Amir|
Episode.Overview: Stewie is addicted to the British children's show "Jolly Farm Review" based on Mother Maggie, a benevolent figure who looks after kids on a farm. They stow away on a plane they think is bound for England. They are wrong, and soon they are in Saudi Arabia at the beginning of a long, strange trip back home. Back in the US, Peter and Lois have an odd encounter with the band Kiss.
